title: Blue-Winged Fairy - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Protagonist   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Special Abilities
author: Agnes Jessica
description:
Both Maya’s parents had passed away due to a landslide. The girl had to live with Setiawan’s family. However, only Setiawan fully accepted her. Her stepmother and stepsister hated her and bullied her.

As she grew older, Maya realized that she had a special ability; she could see people’s lives through touching their hands.

One day, Maya stumbled into the empty house next door and found a writing of a woman who had already passed away. Maya could “see” that the woman had a relationship with Setiawan. And who is Boy, the young man that she met in that empty house?

Note: Tags contain spoiler>
